title: How come my free champs are different to rotation ones?
body: Im using a new account so i can teach my friend who is just starting without having them vs lvl 30s but the champs on it are different to the ones advertised in the rotation why?

replies.body: Because new accounts get the "Easy champions" so they don't get introduced to LoL by playing a hard as fk champ

Because Until you hit level 10, i believe, you will get the same champions for free. It is to help new players find a stable champion to play with.

This was implemented last year I believe.
